changelog.heading: Integration with Research Data Exchange (RDE)
changelog.news:
- Implemented integration application program interface (API) for the Research Data Exchange (RDE).
- Implemented landing page for RDE users to query for data using coordinate-based query wizard.
- Simplified the data subscription creation and sharing processes.

changelog.heading: Weather Telematics (WxTelematics) Data Integration
changelog.news:
- Integrated WxTelematics data (shown as blue dots on the map).
- Updated Vehicle Data Translator (VDT) observation type names to align more with the National Transportation Communications for Intelligent Transportation System Protocol (NTCIP) 1204 and Society for Automotive Engineers (SAE) J2735.
- Integrated data subscription with user management and simplified the subscription and sharing process.
- Improved rendering performance on the Summary Map and the Google Map.
- Updated unit toggling between Metric and English; now works in both the info window and the shade.
- Fixed various bug issues.

changelog.heading: VDT for Michigan and User Interface (UI) Updates
changelog.news:
- Extended VDT capability for Michigan Integrated Mobile Observations (IMOs).
- Introduced shade display as an alternative to the info window.
- Linked the state Summary Map to collection status.
- Detailed collection statistics now available under Admin -> Reports.
- Metadata from the Data -> Metadata -> Tables page can now be downloaded.
- Minnesota and Michigan road segment definition files are now available in the Data -> Metadata -> Files page.

changelog.heading: VDT Segment Data Integration and UI Enhancement
changelog.news:
- Completed integration of VDT segment statistics and assessment.
- Changed the mobile observation display for performance improvement.
- Improved info window display with fix header.
- Fixed bug in query wizard using geospatial coordinates.

changelog.heading: Metadata Updates and VDT Integration
changelog.news:
- Recovered metadata for 65 MN IMOs and 257 sensors for VDT probe data.
- Integrated VDT segment data in the database and midtier.

changelog.heading: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) and VDT Updates
changelog.news:
- Recovered metadata for 42 MI IMOs and 2,061 sensors including 60 belonging to the newly added MI IMOs.
- Populated FAQs.
- Added date and time for feedback.
- Added unique email constraint in user registration.
- Improved data query on observation types.
- Added wxde_support email for notification.
- Fixed VDT integration code to support increasing Network Common Data Form (NetCDF) arrays and keep alive WxDE subscription as VDT input.
- Updated the radar data collector to remove old folders to conserve disk space.
- Completed other UI fixes.

changelog.heading: Email Verification
changelog.news:
- Added email verification, password reset, and user identification (ID) recovery.
- Updated Google Analytics header information.
- Completed other UI fixes.

changelog.heading: New VDT Observations
changelog.news:
- Added new observation types (anti-lock brake status [ABS], speed, heading, etc.) for VDT data.
- Identified and recovered metadata for 99 stations and 499 sensors for VDT data.

changelog.heading: UI and Database Fixes
changelog.news:
- Added FAQ under the About menu with the same look and feel from the RDE. Content is under development.
- Fixed map display for transportable stations.
- Fixed Daylight Saving Time in the database.

changelog.heading: VDT and UI Fixes
changelog.news:
- Fixed VDT temperature readings.
- Fixed header and quality check flag printout in query/subscription result.
- Masked the password for subscription results.
- Changed the color of the Subscribe button.

changelog.heading: VDT Integration
changelog.news: - Integrated VDT quality checked probe data.

changelog.heading: UI Bug Fixes
changelog.news:
- Removed special HTML characters from the feedback description.
- Removed Observation.jsp link from the minimenu.
- Fixed the adjustable height in the showQueryResults.jsp.

changelog.heading: New UI Updates
changelog.news:
- Added About menu.
- Linked Terms of Use.
- Linked Change Log.
- Moved Data Sources from the Admin menu to the About menu.
- Fixed Internet Explorer 8 cache bug.
- Completed various UI fixes.
- Fixed user edit bug.
- Fixed sensor metadata problems.

changelog.heading: WxDE Demonstration Instance Opened
changelog.news: The WxDE 1.0 opens closed beta access to United States Department of Transportation users for review and comment. Open beta will follow after closed beta testing.

changelog.heading: RWM Stakeholder Meeting
changelog.news: The 2013 Road Weather Management Stakeholder Meeting was held July 16 through July 18 in Little Rock, Arkansas.

changelog.heading: WxDE Interim Instance Opened
changelog.news: The WxDE Interim Instance was opened for business and its availability was announced at the 2013 Road Weather Management Stakeholder Meeting.
